_comment: USS CRONUS ship log entries. Each entry needs: id, timestamp, sender, subject, level, detail. Optional: mediaType, mediaUrl, classification. Level: '' | 'warning' | 'critical'. Classification: '' | 'PERSONAL' | 'SYSTEM' | 'MU/TH/UR' | 'MEDICAL' | 'CONFIDENTIAL' | 'SENSITIVE' | 'RESTRICTED' | 'CORPORATE'. Set default:true so entries survive Reset Logs.

logs.detail:
SPECIAL ORDER 966 — EYES ONLY
PRIORITY: ALPHA

TO: SCIENCE OFFICER JOHNS, A.
FROM: WEYLAND-YUTANI SPECIAL PROJECTS DIVISION

NOEROMO PROTOCOL IN EFFECT FOR THIS MISSION.

ALL OTHER PRIORITIES ARE RESCINDED.

UPON ARRIVAL AT LV-1113, SCIENCE OFFICER IS TO DIRECT ALL EFFORTS
TOWARD RECOVERY OF BIOLOGICAL SPECIMENS FROM COORDINATES PROVIDED
UNDER SEPARATE ENCRYPTION KEY (REF: WY-SPD-LV1113-GRID-7).

CREW IS EXPENDABLE.

ENSURE SPECIMEN CONTAINMENT PER PROTOCOL WY-7741.
DO NOT DEVIATE. DO NOT DISCLOSE TO CREW.
FAILURE TO COMPLY WILL RESULT IN FORFEITURE OF ALL COMPENSATION
AND CRIMINAL PROSECUTION UNDER ICC CHARTER SECTION 7.

AUTHORIZATION: SPD-DIRECTOR MERIDIAN
CLASSIFICATION: WY-CORPORATE — EYES ONLY
logs.subject: SPECIAL ORDER 966

logs.detail:
AUTOMATED NETWORK HANDSHAKE LOG:

SHIP-TO-SHIP AUTHENTICATION PROTOCOL AVAILABLE.
NETWORK BRIDGE CAPABILITY: ENABLED

IF ANOTHER WY-REGISTERED VESSEL ESTABLISHES A HARDLINE OR
WIRELESS DATA LINK WITH USS CRONUS, THE FOLLOWING WILL SYNC:

  — PERSONNEL AUTHORIZATION CODES
  — CREW MANIFEST RECORDS
  — NAVIGATION TELEMETRY

NOTE: FULL NETWORK SYNC REQUIRES MAIN COMPUTER ONLINE.
CURRENT STATUS: MAIN COMPUTER — OFFLINE (DAMAGE DETECTED)

SYNC WILL INITIATE AUTOMATICALLY WHEN COMPUTER IS RESTORED
AND A VALID NETWORK LINK IS ESTABLISHED.

REF: WY-NET PROTOCOL 4.2.1
logs.subject: NETWORK SYNC CAPABILITY — STANDBY
